Specific Details: Business priorities on Brexit, infrastructure investment and the importance of the Irish business model.

Specific Details: Spoke with Senator McDowell regarding extending voting rights in the Seanad elections to Diploma and Certificate Students (upwards of level 8 & 9), and discussed registration, constituencies and awareness campaigns for the upcoming election.

Intended Results: Extension of suffrage in NUI Seanad constituency to level 8 & 9 Diploma and Certificate students.
